PC Express Pass

Out of home placements in support of our national campaign.

PC Express Pass is a new subscription model that allows customers pay a set fee for unlimited pickup and/or delivery services at PC Express. To increase brand awareness, our national launch campaign included OOH ad placements spanning across Canada. Working alongside with my team, I got the opportunity to design our placements at Yonge-Dundas Square and Union Station.
